workshoptitle: PeopleSoft PICASO Chatbot Integration with Oracle Digital Assistant

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: Explanation of the Workshop and Goals

tutorials.title: Get Started
tutorials.description: This is the prerequisites for customers using Free Trial and Paid tenancies, and Always Free accounts (if applicable).

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Setup Oracle Digital Assistant from OCI services
tutorials.description: In this lab, the recently provisioned OCI Trial tenancy will used for provision of Oracle Digital Assistant

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Configure PeopleSoft for Oracle Digital Assistant
tutorials.description: In this lab, you will configure PeopleSoft for Oracle Digital Assistant

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Update Skill Configuration in Oracle Digital Assistant
tutorials.description: In this lab, you will update Skill Configuration in Oracle Digital Assistant

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Test the PeopleSoft PICASO chatbot
Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
